{"id":896530506,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1676204455,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"191 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/896530506/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"100.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n\n    //  9 8 7\npublic:\n    bool isMonotonic(vector<int> A) {\n        bool increase = false;\n        bool decrease = false;\n        \n        for (int i = 1; i < A.size(); i++) {\n            if (A[i] < A[i - 1]) {\n                decrease = true;\n            }\n            if (A[i] > A[i - 1]) {\n                increase = true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return increase && decrease ? false : true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
